A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Meh. There were a few things to like scattered amongst the mess. Luke milking a sea cow? Leia space surfing without a suit? Snoke killed with a cheap trick? The entire casino side quest that was a waste of 30 minutes? BB8 fixing an X-wing by using his head as a hammer? Porgs? Caretakers (fish nuns)? The one light saber fight was cool\, but that's about it.
